text: Senior Supreme Court Judge, Eva Wanasundera took oaths as the Acting Chief Justice yesterday (Sep. 13) before President Maithripala Sirisena at the Presidents House in Colombo.Secretary to the President Austin Fernando was also present at this occasion.Senior Supreme Court Judge, Eva Wanasundera took oaths as the Acting Chief Justice yesterday (Sep. 13) before President Maithripala Sirisena at the Presidents House in Colombo.Secretary to the President Austin Fernando was also present at this occasion.
title: Eva Wanasundera, Acting Chief Justice
